  • Classes in com.javagameengine.renderer used by com.javagameengine.assets.material 
    Class and Description
    Bindable
    Interface describing an object that contains a bind() method used for setting up the openGL context.
  • Classes in com.javagameengine.renderer used by com.javagameengine.assets.mesh 
    Class and Description
    Drawable
    Represents an object that contains a method draw() that draws itself into openGL based on the currently bound openGL context.
  • Classes in com.javagameengine.renderer used by com.javagameengine.assets.skybox 
    Class and Description
    Drawable
    Represents an object that contains a method draw() that draws itself into openGL based on the currently bound openGL context.
  • Classes in com.javagameengine.renderer used by com.javagameengine.renderer 
    Class and Description
    Bindable
    Interface describing an object that contains a bind() method used for setting up the openGL context.
    Drawable
    Represents an object that contains a method draw() that draws itself into openGL based on the currently bound openGL context.
    Renderable
    Describes an object that can be rendered into openGL or affects the rendering process.
    Renderer
    Renderer is the main class that handles the rendering pipeline.
    RendererState 
    RendererState.BlendMode 
    RendererState.DepthFunc 
    RenderPass 
    RenderPass.Mode 
    RenderQueue
